name: @xmtp/load-test
description: High-performance load testing framework for XMTP

scripts.test: npm run build && artillery run artillery-config.yml
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && artillery run --output report.json artillery-config.yml
scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('data',{recursive:true,force:true}); require('fs').rmSync('report.json',{force:true}); require('fs').rmSync('artillery-processor.js',{force:true}); console.log('âœ… Cleaned up test data')"
